TEXT.S: Corey Allen kawas tay 1934, ryax sa tay 29 nqu tay 6, Corey Allen, squliq na Bunge'. (wal mhuqil sa kawas tay 2010) Corey Allen htagan beh sa Cleveland, Ohio. hiya ga yaya yaba Carl ru Fran Cohen. raral ga, Allen mqwas beh cyalifuniya , luosanci krahu' pqwasan biru. aring mqwas ru myugi mtzyaw nya. 1954 kwas hiya magal blaq balay biru.
